block.p: BISTRIAN--Peter (Patrick). 87, of Amagansett, NY on December 27, 2003. Beloved husband of Mary Laura nee Ryan. Loving father of Patrick Jr., Bruce R., Barry A., Bonnie Krupinski, Barbara Borg, and Betsy Avallone. Dear brother of the late John and Louis. Also survived by 15 grandchildren, 22 greatgrandchildren and nephews and nieces. Services will be held Tuesday, December 30, 11am at the Amagansett Presbyterian Church. Interment at Cedar Lawn Cemetery, East Hampton. Memorial donations to the Amagansett Presbyterian Church, the Joslin Diabetes Center, Boston, or the Amagansett Volunteer Ambulance Corps would be appreciated.
